title: Oculus Founder: Cables To Be Major Obstacle In VR Industry For A Long Time
description: It might sound obvious, but if you’re hoping that mom will want to hop into virtual reality while you make her drag around a bunch of ugly ass (and dangerous) wires, it probably won’t happen.
